headline: Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings (NCLH): Is the Stock Undervalued After Recent Share Price Volatility?
summary: Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings (NCLH) shares have seen pronounced swings lately, which has some investors digging into what is behind the movement. Year to date, the stock is down nearly 30%, inviting fresh scrutiny of its valuation. See our latest analysis for Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings. Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings’ share price has faced a sharp slide this year, recently closing at $18.20 and marking a year-to-date share price return of -29.8%.
